problem_names:
lemma rel_fun_comp:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

lemma rel_fun_comp1:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "R' = R1 OO R2"
  shows "(R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

lemma rel_fun_comp2:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "S' = S1 OO S2"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h"

lemma rel_fun_relcompp:
  "((R1 ===> S1) OO (R2 ===> S2)) a b \<Longrightarrow> ((R1 OO R2) ===> (S1 OO S2)) a b"

lemma rel_fun_comp1':
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "\<And> a b. R' a b \<Longrightarrow> (R1 OO R2) a b"
  shows "(R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

lemma rel_fun_comp2':
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "\<And> a b. (S1 OO S2) a b \<Longrightarrow> S' a b"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h"
translations:
lemma rel_fun_comp:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R1 OO R2 ===> S1 OO S2) f h
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  (R1 ===> S1) f g
  (R2 ===> S2) g h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R1 OO R2 ===> S1 OO S2) f h
by (auto intro!: rel_funI dest!: rel_funD)

lemma rel_fun_comp1:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "R' = R1 OO R2"
  shows "(R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h
using assms rel_fun_comp

proof (prove)
using this:
  (R1 ===> S1) f g
  (R2 ===> S2) g h
  R' = R1 OO R2
  \<lbrakk>(?R1.0 ===> ?S1.0) ?f ?g; (?R2.0 ===> ?S2.0) ?g ?h\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?R1.0 OO ?R2.0 ===> ?S1.0 OO ?S2.0) ?f ?h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h
by metis

lemma rel_fun_comp2:
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "S' = S1 OO S2"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h
using assms rel_fun_comp

proof (prove)
using this:
  (R1 ===> S1) f g
  (R2 ===> S2) g h
  S' = S1 OO S2
  \<lbrakk>(?R1.0 ===> ?S1.0) ?f ?g; (?R2.0 ===> ?S2.0) ?g ?h\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (?R1.0 OO ?R2.0 ===> ?S1.0 OO ?S2.0) ?f ?h

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h
by metis

lemma rel_fun_relcompp:
  "((R1 ===> S1) OO (R2 ===> S2)) a b \<Longrightarrow> ((R1 OO R2) ===> (S1 OO S2)) a b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((R1 ===> S1) OO (R2 ===> S2)) a b \<Longrightarrow>
    (R1 OO R2 ===> S1 OO S2) a b
unfolding OO_def rel_fun_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>y.
       (\<forall>x ya. R1 x ya \<longrightarrow> S1 (a x) (y ya)) \<and>
       (\<forall>x ya.
           R2 x ya \<longrightarrow> S2 (y x) (b ya)) \<Longrightarrow>
    \<forall>x y.
       (\<exists>ya. R1 x ya \<and> R2 ya y) \<longrightarrow>
       (\<exists>ya. S1 (a x) ya \<and> S2 ya (b y))
by blast

lemma rel_fun_comp1':
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "\<And> a b. R' a b \<Longrightarrow> (R1 OO R2) a b"
  shows "(R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R' ===> S1 OO S2) f h
by (auto intro: assms rel_fun_mono[OF rel_fun_comp1])

lemma rel_fun_comp2':
  assumes "(R1 ===> S1) f g" "(R2 ===> S2) g h" "\<And> a b. (S1 OO S2) a b \<Longrightarrow> S' a b"
  shows "(R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (R1 OO R2 ===> S') f h
by (auto intro: assms rel_fun_mono[OF rel_fun_comp1])
end
end
